From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
To: BRO-Le alVisit-S ov>, Achal Fernando-Peiris 
Cc: • BRO/Exec Assistant--
< i 
bop.gov>, ' 
Subject: URGENT REQUEST-GHISLAINE MAXWELL 02879-509 
Date: Fri, 20 Nov 2020 19:36:44 +0000 
My client -Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509- has been placed in quarantine 
due to contact with a corrections officer who became infected with COVID. 
I have not received notification that my scheduled legal visits-
for tomorrow 11/21 and next Saturday 11/28 from 12:30 pm - 3:00 pm-
but I assume they are cancelled. 
IN LIEU OF THE LEGAL VISITS - I AM REQUESTING LEGAL CALLS 
FOR TOMORROW AND NEXT SATURDAY FROM 12:30 -3:00 PM. 
There are time sensitive matters to be discussed. 
Thank you-
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law 
Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim 
ew 
Main: 
Cell: 
Fax: 
••Covid-19 Notice: The \Vest 19th Street office is currently closed but we continue to work remotely. 
Please use entail or fax, instead of regular mail, for all correspondence during this time. 
We continue to work regular business hours throughout this situation. 
Thank you for your consideration. Our best wishes for your good health and well being. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and 
then delete this message. Thank you. 
On Nov 17, 2020, at 9:27 AM, BRO-LegalVisit-S < 
You are scheduled as follows 
Rkip.gov> wrote: 
November 21, 2020 
12:30 pm to 3:00 pm 
EFTA00010187

November 28, 2020 
12:30 pm to 3:00 pm

Thank you-
Bobbi
